sentences: Shawn Christopher is a female African-American house-music singer from Chicago, Illinois.
She was a touring backing vocalist for R&B singer Chaka Khan, from 1982 to 1985.
She sang lead vocals on a song by DJ/producer Lil Louis titled "French Kiss" in 1989.
The song became a #1 hit on the Billboard Hot Dance Club Play chart that year.
In addition, she sang backing vocals on Jimmy Somerville's #1 Hot Dance Club Play track from 1995, "Heartbeat".
